scripts.static: cp client/src/index.html dist && cp -r client/assets/. dist
scripts.static:min: npm run static && place dist/index.html style.css style.min.css && place dist/index.html main.js main.min.js
scripts.js:min: npm run js && babili dist/main.js > dist/main.min.js
scripts.build: npm install && mkdir dist && npm run static:min && npm run css:min && npm run js:min
scripts.debug: npm run clean:dist && npm run lint && mkdir dist && npm run static && npm run css && npm run js
scripts.start:debug: nodemon --exec npm run debug --ignore dist -e js,less,html
